name: NATIONAL KIDNEY FOUNDATION
description: Provides awareness, prevention and treatment of kidney disease
sampleDescriptions: Advance policy priorities on behalf of kidney patients while positioning NKF as the leading advocacy organization representing kidney patients.
Advance policy priorities on behalf of kidney patients while positioning NKF as the leading advocacy organization representing kidney patients.
Promoting policies that increase the number of living donors and ensuring patient access to care that improves outcomes for patients with kidney disease.
Promoting policies that increase the number of living donors and ensuring patient access to care that improves outcomes for patients with kidney disease.
Working to extend Medicare drug coverage of immunosuppressant coverage for kidney transplant recipients.
